attributes.additional_details: my daughter was murdered in 2000...she died in result of her liver being in half,she had her ears boxed and the man who did this was aquitted then in 2005 judge orrel from derby crown court named him my daughters killer as derby social services brought proceedings against him for battering 2 boys....he has walked away free with no sentencing made...i have been battling for justice now for 13 years an yet this man has been named for murdering my daughter...please sign this petition to help me get the justice that should of been served 13 years ago..i dont want no more children being hurt by this monster..i want you to over turn the first trial and go for a 2nd trial with judge orrel being a prosicution witness anget this vile animal off the streets
